name: Edelweiss (felixmariotto)
description:
Edelweiss
  • no-rush platformer
  • exploration
  • amazing soundtrack

Edelweiss is a 3D puzzle-platformer game, that I coded in Javascript with a custom game engine. It is open-source, so I invite you to have a look at the code on Github.

This project was born while I was playing a Metroid game, and realised how much I wanted to play a platformer with metroidvania mechanics. At the same time, I wanted to give it a puzzle game feel, so unlike most platformer game, you won't feel rushed with this one.

It is my first "large"-scale project, so I am very intersted in your feedback !

I most respectfully thank the musicians who accepted that I feature their tracks in my game, please check out their work :

  • Strom Noir - Such a Beautiful Winter Day (village biome)
  • Simon Bainton - Tankah (lowland biome)
  • Simon Bainton  - Hurtstone (cave biome)
  • Tobias Hellkvist - Where No One Can Hear You (forest biome)
  • Andrew Odd - Elysium (windy cliff biome)
  • Kyle Preston - Borken Photosynthesis (mountaintop biome)
